name: Data Compressed
description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network
pattern:
title: Data Compressed
id: a3b5e3e9-1b49-4119-8b8e-0344a01f21ee
status: experimental
description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount
    of data sent over the network
author: Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community
date: 2019/10/21
modified: 2019/11/04
references:
    - https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/master/atomics/T1002/T1002.yaml
logsource:
    product: linux
    service: auditd
detection:
    selection1:
        type: 'execve'
        a0: 'zip'
    selection2:
        type: 'execve'
        a0: 'gzip'
        a1: '-f'
    selection3:
        type: 'execve'
        a0: 'tar'
        a1|contains: '-c'
    condition: 1 of them
falsepositives:
    - Legitimate use of archiving tools by legitimate user
level: low
tags:
    - attack.exfiltration
    - attack.t1002
